original_text: The tribe of Ephraim must be on the west side of the Tent. They must have their flag with them and they must live in groups. The leader of the tribe of Ephraim is Elishama, the son of Ammihud.
korean_text: 서쪽에는 에브라임의 군대의 진영의 군기가 있을 것이라 에브라임 자손의 지휘관은 암미훗의 아들 엘리사마요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Ephraim must be on the west side
They must have their flag with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들의 깃발을 가지고 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and they must live in groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 무리를 지어 살아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The leader of the tribe of Ephraim
is Elishama, the son of Ammihud
